name: MessageFactory_createBindingRequestTest
description: Unit tests for the creation of Binding Request messages using the MessageFactory.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingRequest
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Binding Request message and verifies its type.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingRequestWithPriority
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Binding Request message with a priority attribute and verifies its type and priority value.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingRequestWithPriorityAndControlling
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Binding Request message with priority and controlling attributes and verifies its type, priority value, and tie breaker.

test_cases.name: testCreateBindingRequestWithPriorityAndControlled
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Binding Request message with priority and controlled attributes and verifies its type, priority value, and tie breaker.
